articles.title: Liverpool's Borggrafe joins Leverkusen on loan
articles.summary: Liverpool goalkeeper Rafaela Borggrafe joins Bayer Leverkusen on loan for the rest of the 2025-26 season.

articles.title: Just seven signings - the Premier League's quiet deadline day
articles.summary: A low-key transfer deadline day ended with the fewest Premier League deals completed in a winter window. BBC Sport looks at the spending that was done, and examines why there was so little activity.

articles.title: Is Benzema joining rivals behind Ronaldo's frustration in Saudi Arabia?
articles.summary: Cristiano Ronaldo's future at Al-Nassr is plunged into doubt after he is left out of their squad for Monday's Saudi Pro League game against Al-Riyadh.
